name: everlastingly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that lasts forever, or for a very long time: I don't believe that he deserves to suffer everlastingly for his crimes. The most important thing is to hold on everlastingly to the truth. Related word
everlasting
More examplesFewer examplesThe flowers seemed to bloom everlastingly in the southern sun.She promised to work everlastingly for the people of her country.If we want to protect biodiversity everlastingly, we need to make some big changes.They believe that God exists everlastingly and is omnipotent.The river flowed everlastingly over its bed of stones.
